name: MySQL5

getPSDEDataQueryCodeConds.customCond:
( 1=1 <choose><when test="ctx.webcontext.n_project_id_eq !=null "> and  exists(select 1 from `work_item` t2 where t1.principal_id = t2.id and t2.PROJECT_ID = #{ctx.webcontext.n_project_id_eq} )</when>
<when test="ctx.webcontext.n_product_id_eq !=null "> 
and  ((exists(select 1 from `idea` t2 where t1.principal_id = t2.id and t2.PRODUCT_ID = #{ctx.webcontext.n_product_id_eq})) 
or 
(exists(select 1 from `ticket` t2 where t1.principal_id = t2.id and t2.PRODUCT_ID = #{ctx.webcontext.n_product_id_eq})) 
or 
(exists(select 1 from `customer` t2 where t1.principal_id = t2.id and t1.principal_type = 'CUSTOMER' and t2.PRODUCT_ID = #{ctx.webcontext.n_product_id_eq})))  </when>
<when test="ctx.webcontext.n_library_id_eq !=null "> and   exists(select 1 from `test_case` t2 where t1.principal_id = t2.id and t2.LIBRARY_ID = #{ctx.webcontext.n_library_id_eq})  </when>
<when test="ctx.webcontext.n_space_id_eq !=null "> and   exists(select 1 from `page` t2 where t1.principal_id = t2.id and t2.SPACE_ID = #{ctx.webcontext.n_space_id_eq})  </when>
</choose> )
getPSDEDataQueryCodeConds.name: 查询条件

queryCode:
SELECT
t1.`CONTENT`,
t1.`CREATE_MAN`,
t1.`CREATE_TIME`,
t1.`ID`,
t1.`NAME`,
t1.`OWNER_TYPE`,
t11.`CONTENT` AS `PCONTENT`,
t11.`CREATE_MAN` AS `PCREATE_MAN`,
t1.`PID`,
t1.`PRINCIPAL_ID`,
t1.`PRINCIPAL_NAME`,
t1.`PRINCIPAL_TYPE`,
t1.`UPDATE_MAN`,
t1.`UPDATE_TIME`
FROM `COMMENT` t1 
LEFT JOIN `COMMENT` t11 ON t1.`PID` = t11.`ID`
